mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.title, p.text, p.create_time, p.update_time, p.read_count, p.summary, p.menu_id, p.enable, case when temp.comment_count is null then 0 else temp.comment_count end as comment_count FROM paper p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(*) AS comment_count, pc.paper_id FROM paper_comment pc WHERE pc.active = 1 and pc.enable = 1 and pc.paper_id = #{id} GROUP BY paper_id ) temp on temp.paper_id = p.id where p.active = 1 and p.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO paper(title, text, create_time, summary, menu_id) VALUES(#{title}, #{text}, sysdate(), #{summary}, #{menuId})
mapper.update:
UPDATE paper t
t.title = #{title},
t.text = #{text},
t.menu_id = #{menuId},
t.summary = #{summary},
t.update_time = sysdate()
where t.id = #{id}
